subject: Labor and Jobs
Basketball
Lockouts
Agents (Business)
lead_paragraph: Five of the most influential agents are reported to be pushing for the N.B.A. players union to decertify and might start a drive to do so over the objections of union officials.
snippet: Five of the most influential agents are reported to be pushing for the N.B.A. players union to decertify and might start a drive to do so over the objections of union officials.
